row.process: :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Checking if all backup files exist" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO $FILE_COUNT=0 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ANAYLTICS.PRV.INCLUDE.BACKUP_FILENAMES :WHILE &ANALYTICS_TABLES_CURSOR# LE &ANALYTICS_TABLES_LEN# : SET &ANALYTICS_TABLES#[&ANALYTICS_TABLES_CURSOR#] = &ANALYTICS_BACKUP_BASE_FILENAME#&ANALYTICS_TABLES#[&ANALYTICS_TABLES_CURSOR#] : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&ANALYTICS_TABLES#[&ANALYTICS_TABLES_CURSOR#]" : P &UC4RB_CHECKME# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE_CMD@WINDOWS : SET &ANALYTICS_TABLES_CURSOR# = &ANALYTICS_TABLES_CURSOR# + 1 if( $ISFILE -eq "1") { $FILE_COUNT = $FILE_COUNT+1 : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Found backupfile: &UC4RB_CHECKME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO } else { : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "No backup file found: &UC4RB_CHECKME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO } :ENDWHILE
